snippet.title: Burn With Me - A devil deckbuilder where you burn your cards to succeed!
snippet.description:
Play for free on itch.io https://nozomu57.itch.io/burn-with-me?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Place creatures on pentagram. Summon more creatures. Don't burn your whole deck. Be prepared for Him.

Burn With Me is an addictive deckbuilder with atmosphere of dark mystery and powers that you barely manage to control.

Synergize creatures on the field for successful rituals, summon new ones for your deck, burn old ones for a bigger purpose.

What did you want to summon Satan for, again?

➡️ More from Nozomu Games https://nozomu57.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More Ludum Dare 55 games https://itch.io/games/tag-ludum-dare-55?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
